label: Sinai Georgian NF frag 68a, Undertext (Christian Palestinian Aramaic)

note.value: Göttingen, Syr. 23, fol. 4r, lines 1–9 + Sinai Georgian NF frag. 68a r, lines  12–22; Göttingen, Syr. 23, fol. 4v, lines 1–9 + Sinai Georgian NF frag. 68a v, lines 12–22
Description of undertext by Christa Müller-Kessler

Bibliography: H. Duensing, Nachlese christlich-palästinisch aramäischer Fragmente, NAWG, phil.-hist. Kl. 5, Göttingen: Vandenhoeck & Ruprecht, 1955 ; A. Desreumaux, “Ephraim in Christian Palestinian Aramaic,” in Hugoye 1 (1998), pp. 221-226 ; S. P. Brock, “Sinai: A Meeting Point of Georgian with Syriac and Christian Palestinian Aramaic,” in The Caucasus between East & West, Tbilisi: National Centre of Manuscripts, 2012, pp. 482–494 ; C. Müller-Kessler, “Piecing together Christian Palestinian Aramaic Texts under Georgian Manuscripts (St Petersburg, NLR, Syr. 16; Sinai, Georg. NF 19, 71; Oslo, Martin Schøyen MS 35, 37; Princeton, Garrett MS 24; Göttingen, Syr. 17, 19, 23, 25),” Digital Kartvelology 1 (2022), pp. 1-25 [https://adh.ge/en/digital-kartvelology/]
